kpi.name: M1022C231

kpi_info.title: PS USER PLANE RELEASE TO DCH 0/0 DUE TO INACTIVITY
kpi_info.use: The number of PS NRT user plane reconfigurations to DCH 0/0 because of user plane inactivity. UPDATED: When L2 indicates inactivity to L3 which triggers user plane release to DCH 0/0. The original channel type can be HSxPA or Rel99 DCH x/y. Using DCH 0/0 instead of PCH or FACH happens because the UE has got another RAB whose user plane cannot be released, for example CS call.

kpi.kpi_alias: PS USER PLANE RELEASE TO DCH 0/0 DUE TO INACTIVITY
